alcoholic1.name: Alcoholic
alcoholic1.desc: Starts dependent on alcohol. Suffers withdrawal without it, but gets a bonus when drinking.

buzzed.name: Buzzed
buzzed.desc: Slightly intoxicated. Willpower is up, but Perception is slightly lowered.

hangover.name: Hangover
hangover.desc: The morning after. Willpower and Dexterity are temporarily reduced.

medic1.name: Field Medic
medic1.desc: Basic medical training. Provides a significant starting bonus to the Medicine skill.

hunter1.name: Hunter
hunter1.desc: Skilled in tracking and stalking prey. Provides bonuses to Survival and Ranged skills.

artificer1.name: Artificer
artificer1.desc: A tinkerer and inventor. Provides bonuses to Crafting and Science skills.

strategicMap.selectSector: Select a sector on the map to see details.

scavenger_base.name: Scavenger Base
scavenger_base.desc: A well-established outpost for a group of scavengers.

scavenger_camp.name: Scavenger Camp
scavenger_camp.desc: A small camp. They might not be here for long, aren't they?

scavenger_group.name: Scavenger Group
scavenger_group.desc: A group of scavengers. Did they find something valuable?

scavenger_patrol.name: Scavenger Patrol
scavenger_patrol.desc: A small, mobile group of scavengers.

abandoned_car.name: Abandoned Car
abandoned_car.desc: A rusted-out husk of a vehicle. Might be something inside.

crashed_drone.name: Crashed Drone
crashed_drone.desc: A military-grade drone, half-buried in the dirt. Its cargo might still be intact.

makeshift_cache.name: Makeshift Cache
makeshift_cache.desc: A cleverly hidden stash of supplies.

makeshiftKnife.name: Makeshift Knife
makeshiftKnife.desc: A crude blade made from scrap metal. It gets the job done.

pumpShotgun.name: Pump Shotgun
pumpShotgun.desc: Reliable close-quarters firepower. Loud and messy.

travelDuster.name: Travel Duster
travelDuster.desc: Worn leather coat offering protection from the elements and minor scrapes.
